title: Chemical Maker Trinseo Mulls Possible Bankruptcy in Lender Talks
description: Trinseo Plc, a Pennsylvania-based plastics maker, is in discussions with creditors about restructuring its debt — a deal that could be carried out through a possible bankruptcy filing in the coming weeks, according to people familiar with the matter.
